title: Frame King v1.0 – Compose pictures into beautiful frames
content: Frame King is a great application for incorporating several photos into frames and composing amazing pictures. Application has intuitive layout and helps you to create amazing collages in a few simple steps. title: Fragment v1.3.0 – alternative image viewer for the Desktop
content: Fragment is a cool, alternative image viewer for the Desktop –  Unique HUD UI. Both attractive and useful for keeping image content at maximum screen real-estate. Unique “Fill view” viewing option. Equivalent to Pan-And-Scan, this mode maximizes the use of application window, perfect for Panoramic pictures long tall funny pics from the net. title: Due 1.2.1 – Set reminders in your own words
content: Due lets you type “Make dinner reservation at 9am tomorrow” and your reminder is set for 9 AM tomorrow.   “Cancel subscription in 1 month” and you get a buzz a month later.   Just tell Due in your own words what you’d like to do, and when you’d like to be reminded.   There […]

title: CustomMenu v1.0 – Global menu containing your favorite apps, files and folders
content: CustomMenu lets you build your own global menu containing your favorite apps, files and folders. Once created, you can easily open apps and files or browse folders and access their contents from any app with your CustomMenu. An OS X Dock usually contains running apps, often used apps, files, folders, and minimized windows. By adding items to […]

title: Active Clock v1.0 – Clock for you desktop
content: Active Clock is a well organized and functional time piece that will keep you on top of your daily routines. title: Knox v2.2.0 – Secure, integrated encryption and backup solution
content: Knox is a uniquely integrated encryption and backup solution that makes securing your files easier than ever. Create as many encrypted vaults as you want, each with separate passwords. Then schedule automatic backups. You can even reformat USB sticks and external drives as encrypted Knox vaults – moving files between Macs has never been so […]
